The Facebook post featuring the chart ti: Disease Deaths per Day Worldwide" was published on March 11, 2020.
The chart was created by: Information Is Beautiful," a website managed by graphic designer David McCandless, and was originally published on March 9, 2020, on Facebook and their website.
The claim compares the daily mortality r: 19 with other fatal diseases such as tuberculosis, HIV/AIDS, and seasonal flu, which experts deem as misguided and unfair due to the rapidly growing mortality rate of COVID-19.
Risk communication expert Brian Zikmund: Fisher from the University of Michigan School of Public Health states that the chart's choice of data is problematic as it compares the rapidly spreading COVID-19 infections, which are exploding exponentially, with persistent rates of other diseases that are not changing much over time.
